To install:
1. Download this torrent.
2. Unpack the .rar - files in the folder "Adobe Photoshop CS4".
3. Go into the folder.
4. Run the file "Setup.exe", or just "Setup".
5. Follow the instructions.

Note: This is only 30-day trials.
Why upload this, then, when it's available at the Adobe website?
Well, people are lazy, and don't have the power to register there to get a hold of it.
Further more, it's not an easy thing to find the older version, CS3, even at the website.

Enjoy this during the month. Use it well!
